forget¶

Module for models of offline learning and forgetting @author Siddharth Reddy <sgr45@cornell.edu> 07/16/15

class forget.ForgettingModel¶

Superclass for models of the forgetting effect

penalty_terms(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of penalty terms that get subtracted from the means of Gaussian learning updates, one for each lesson interaction
class forget.LinearForgettingModel(alpha, beta)¶

A model of the forgetting effect that increases learning penalties linearly with the time elapsed since the previous interaction

penalty_terms(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of penalty terms that get subtracted from the means of Gaussian learning updates, one for each lesson interaction
class forget.LinearLUVModel(alpha, beta)¶

A model of learning update variances that increases variance linearly with time elapsed since previous interaction

learning_update_variances(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of Gaussian learning update variances, one for each lesson interaction
class forget.LogisticForgettingModel(alpha, beta)¶

A model of the forgetting effect that increases learning penalties as a function of the time elapsed since the previous interaction passed through the logistic function

penalty_terms(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of penalty terms that get subtracted from the means of Gaussian learning updates
class forget.LogisticLUVModel(alpha, beta)¶

A model of learning update variances that increases variance as a function of time elapsed since previous interaction passed through the logistic function

learning_update_variances(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of Gaussian learning update variances, one for each lesson interaction
class forget.TimeVaryingLUVModel¶

Superclass for models of time-varying learning update variance

learning_update_variances(times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns)¶
Parameters:times_since_prev_ixn_for_lesson_ixns (np.array) – Time since the previous interaction, for each lesson interaction
Return type:np.array
Returns:A list of penalty terms that get subtracted from the means of Gaussian learning updates
